content: yes, routines are beneficial but so is flexibility and being freelance allows for both. however, being freelance and adhering to routine requires a mindset or personality that can self-govern; one that doesn’t require an authority beyond self to put structure to one’s life. freelance is strictly for those with a strong self-authority and determination. article was mis-focused but the two-week experience seemed very beneficial for the athor in a personal-discovery sense.
